name: Duality - Remastered
description:
Hit F1 for fullscreen on the web build!

A stealth game made in about 12 hours for the 7HFPS challenge. I spent a few more hours polishing it a bit for the 7DFPS jam, bringing you the remastered version >:D.

Special thanks to Robert "do-the-robot" Storm for allowing me to use his music!
